content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- OpenHack MDWH
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

-- Load table
DECLARE @MaxSK INT;
SELECT @MaxSK = ISNULL(MAX(CustomerSK), 0) FROM [dbo].[DimCustomers]

INSERT INTO [dbo].[DimCustomers] (
    [CustomerSK],
    [CustomerID],
    [LastName],
    [FirstName],
    [AddressLine1],
    [AddressLine2],
    [City],
    [State],
    [ZipCode],
    [PhoneNumber],
    [RecordStartDate],
    [RecordEndDate],
    [ActiveFlag]
)
SELECT * FROM (
	SELECT 
		@MaxSK + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ExternalTable.LastName, ExternalTable.FirstName) AS CustomerSK,
		ExternalTable.GlobalCustomerID AS CustomerID,
		ExternalTable.LastName AS LastName,
		ExternalTable.FirstName AS FirstName,
		ExternalTable.AddressLine1 AS AddressLine1,
		ExternalTable.AddressLine2 AS AddressLine2,
		ExternalTable.City AS City,
		ExternalTable.State AS State,
		ExternalTable.ZipCode AS ZipCode,
		ExternalTable.PhoneNumber AS PhoneNumber,
		ExternalTable.RecordStartDate AS RecordStartDate,
		ExternalTable.RecordEndDate AS RecordEndDate,
		ExternalTable.ActiveFlag AS ActiveFlag
	FROM (
		SELECT
			MAX(GlobalCustomerID) AS GlobalCustomerID,
			LastName,
			FirstName,
			AddressLine1,
			CASE 
				WHEN AddressLine2 = 'NULL' THEN NULL
				ELSE AddressLine2
			END AS AddressLine2,
			City,
			State,
			ZipCode,
			PhoneNumber,
			MAX(UpdatedDate) AS RecordStartDate,
			NULL AS RecordEndDate,
			1 AS ActiveFlag
		FROM
			[ext].[customers] cust
		GROUP BY
			LastName,
			FirstName,
			AddressLine1,
			AddressLine2,
			City,
			State,
			ZipCode,
			PhoneNumber
	) ExternalTable
) CleansedTable
WHERE CleansedTable.CustomerID NOT IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM [dbo].[DimCustomers])

-- Check Load
-- SELECT * FROM [dbo].[DimCustomers]
